page.title: 18Material Matters.
page.content: Mrs.Hoare's class decided to take a census of all the Lower Juniors. We made up the questions and Mrs.Hoare printed some copies. We filled in our own then went round to the other two classes and helped the children fill in their census forms.Next we collated the answers. Here are the results: 50 boys.7 were 7yrs with 87 brothers 41 girls,51 were 8yrs with 79 sisters =91asked 33were9yrs. CENTRAL HEATING: HOMES: 26 detached 40 gas 4 none 34 semis 38 electricity 29 terraced 5 oil 1 flat 4 solid fuel 1 caravan GARAGES:66 single TRANSPORT:107 cars 12 double 32 motorbikes 13 none 300 bikes TV:85 colour 64 videos 72 stereos 70 bl/white 29 computers 27 microwave 64both 85 fridges 85 freezers
